import numpy as np
from sklearn.base import BaseEstimator

class MyDummyClassifier(BaseEstimator):
Â  Â  # fit( ) ë©”ì†Œë“œëŠ” ì•„ë¬´ê²ƒë„ í•™ìŠµí•˜ì§€ ì•ŠìŒ.
Â  Â  def fit(self, X , y=None):
Â  Â  Â  Â  pass

Â  Â  # predict( ) ë©”ì†Œë“œëŠ” ë‹¨ìˆœíˆ Sex featureê°€ 1 ì´ë©´ 0 , ê·¸ë ‡ì§€ ì•Šìœ¼ë©´ 1 ë¡œ ì˜ˆì¸¡í•¨.
Â  Â  def predict(self, X):
Â  Â  Â  Â  pred = np.zeros((X.shape[0], 1))
Â  Â  Â  Â  for i in range (X.shape[0]) :
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  if X['Sex'].iloc[i] == 1:
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  pred[i] = 0
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  else :
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  pred[i] = 1

Â  Â  Â  Â  return pred

import numpy as np
from sklearn.base import BaseEstimator

class MyDummyClassifier(BaseEstimator):
Â  Â  # fit( ) ë©”ì†Œë“œëŠ” ì•„ë¬´ê²ƒë„ í•™ìŠµí•˜ì§€ ì•ŠìŒ.
Â  Â  def fit(self, X , y=None):
Â  Â  Â  Â  pass

Â  Â  # predict( ) ë©”ì†Œë“œëŠ” ë‹¨ìˆœíˆ Sex featureê°€ 1 ì´ë©´ 0 , ê·¸ë ‡ì§€ ì•Šìœ¼ë©´ 1 ë¡œ ì˜ˆì¸¡í•¨.
Â  Â  def predict(self, X):
Â  Â  Â  Â  pred = np.zeros((X.shape[0], 1))
Â  Â  Â  Â  for i in range (X.shape[0]) :
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  if X['Sex'].iloc[i] == 1:
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  pred[i] = 0
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  else :
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  pred[i] = 1

Â  Â  Â  Â  return pred

text.content:
from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder

# Null ì²˜ë¦¬ í•¨ìˆ˜
def fillna(df):
Â  Â  df['Age'] = df['Age'].fillna(df['Age'].mean(), inplace=True)
Â  Â  df['Cabin'] = df['Cabin'].fillna('N', inplace=True)
Â  Â  df['Embarked'] = df['Embarked'].fillna('N', inplace=True)
Â  Â  df['Fare'] = df['Fare'].fillna(0, inplace=True)
Â  Â  return df

# ë¨¸ì‹ ëŸ¬ë‹ ì•Œê³ ë¦¬ì¦˜ì— ë¶ˆí•„ìš”í•œ í”¼ì²˜ ì œê±°
def drop_features(df):
Â  Â  df.drop(['PassengerId', 'Name', 'Ticket'], axis=1, inplace=True)
Â  Â  return df

# ë ˆì´ë¸” ì¸ì½”ë”© ìˆ˜í–‰.
def format_features(df):
Â  Â  df['Cabin'] = df['Cabin'].str[:1]
Â  Â  features = ['Cabin', 'Sex', 'Embarked']
Â  Â  for feature in features:
Â  Â  Â  Â  le = LabelEncoder()
Â  Â  Â  Â  le = le.fit(df[feature])
Â  Â  Â  Â  df[feature] = le.transform(df[feature])
Â  Â  return df

# ì•ì—ì„œ ì„¤ì •í•œ ë°ì´í„° ì „ì²˜ë¦¬ í•¨ìˆ˜ í˜¸ì¶œ
def transform_features(df):
Â  Â  df = fillna(df)
Â  Â  df = drop_features(df)
Â  Â  df = format_features(df)
Â  Â  return df

from sklearn.preprocessing import LabelEncoder

# Null ì²˜ë¦¬ í•¨ìˆ˜
def fillna(df):
Â  Â  df['Age'] = df['Age'].fillna(df['Age'].mean(), inplace=True)
Â  Â  df['Cabin'] = df['Cabin'].fillna('N', inplace=True)
Â  Â  df['Embarked'] = df['Embarked'].fillna('N', inplace=True)
Â  Â  df['Fare'] = df['Fare'].fillna(0, inplace=True)
Â  Â  return df

# ë¨¸ì‹ ëŸ¬ë‹ ì•Œê³ ë¦¬ì¦˜ì— ë¶ˆí•„ìš”í•œ í”¼ì²˜ ì œê±°
def drop_features(df):
Â  Â  df.drop(['PassengerId', 'Name', 'Ticket'], axis=1, inplace=True)
Â  Â  return df

# ë ˆì´ë¸” ì¸ì½”ë”© ìˆ˜í–‰.
def format_features(df):
Â  Â  df['Cabin'] = df['Cabin'].str[:1]
Â  Â  features = ['Cabin', 'Sex', 'Embarked']
Â  Â  for feature in features:
Â  Â  Â  Â  le = LabelEncoder()
Â  Â  Â  Â  le = le.fit(df[feature])
Â  Â  Â  Â  df[feature] = le.transform(df[feature])
Â  Â  return df

# ì•ì—ì„œ ì„¤ì •í•œ ë°ì´í„° ì „ì²˜ë¦¬ í•¨ìˆ˜ í˜¸ì¶œ
def transform_features(df):
Â  Â  df = fillna(df)
Â  Â  df = drop_features(df)
Â  Â  df = format_features(df)
Â  Â  return df

text.content:
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score

# ì›ë³¸ ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ì¬ë¡œë”©, ë°ì´í„° ê°€ê³µ, í•™ìŠµ ë°ì´í„°/í…ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸ ë°ì´í„° ë¶„í• .
titanic_df = pd.read_csv('train.csv')
y_titanic_df = titanic_df['Survived']
X_titanic_df= titanic_df.drop('Survived', axis=1)
X_titanic_df = transform_features(X_titanic_df)
X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test=train_test_split(X_titanic_df, y_titanic_df,
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  test_size=0.2, random_state=0)

# ìœ„ì—ì„œ ìƒì„±í•œ Dummy Classifierë¥¼ ì´ìš©í•´ í•™ìŠµ/ì˜ˆì¸¡/í‰ê°€ ìˆ˜í–‰.
myclf = MyDummyClassifier()
myclf.fit(X_train, y_train)

mypredictions = myclf.predict(X_test)
print('Dummy Classifierì˜ ì •í™•ë„ëŠ”: {0:.4f}'.format(accuracy_score(y_test, mypredictions)))

>>> Dummy Classifierì˜ ì •í™•ë„ëŠ”: 0.7877

import pandas as pd
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score

# ì›ë³¸ ë°ì´í„°ë¥¼ ì¬ë¡œë”©, ë°ì´í„° ê°€ê³µ, í•™ìŠµ ë°ì´í„°/í…ŒìŠ¤íŠ¸ ë°ì´í„° ë¶„í• .
titanic_df = pd.read_csv('train.csv')
y_titanic_df = titanic_df['Survived']
X_titanic_df= titanic_df.drop('Survived', axis=1)
X_titanic_df = transform_features(X_titanic_df)
X_train, X_test, y_train, y_test=train_test_split(X_titanic_df, y_titanic_df,
Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  Â  test_size=0.2, random_state=0)

# ìœ„ì—ì„œ ìƒì„±í•œ Dummy Classifierë¥¼ ì´ìš©í•´ í•™ìŠµ/ì˜ˆì¸¡/í‰ê°€ ìˆ˜í–‰.
myclf = MyDummyClassifier()
myclf.fit(X_train, y_train)

mypredictions = myclf.predict(X_test)
print('Dummy Classifierì˜ ì •í™•ë„ëŠ”: {0:.4f}'.format(accuracy_score(y_test, mypredictions)))

from sklearn.datasets import load_digits
from sklearn.model_selection import train_test_split
from sklearn.base import BaseEstimator
from sklearn.metrics import accuracy_score
import numpy as np
import pandas as pd

class MyFakeClassifier(BaseEstimator):
Â  Â  def fit(self,X,y):
Â  Â  Â  Â  pass

Â  Â  # ì…ë ¥ê°’ìœ¼ë¡œ ë“¤ì–´ì˜¤ëŠ” X ë°ì´í„° ì…‹ì˜ í¬ê¸°ë§Œí¼ ëª¨ë‘ 0ê°’ìœ¼ë¡œ ë§Œë“¤ì–´ì„œ ë°˜í™˜
Â  Â  def predict(self,X):
Â  Â  Â  Â  return np.zeros( (len(X), 1) , dtype=bool)

# ì‚¬ì´í‚·ëŸ°ì˜ ë‚´ì¥ ë°ì´í„° ì…‹ì¸ load_digits( )ë¥¼ ì´ìš©í•˜ì—¬ MNIST ë°ì´í„° ë¡œë”©
digits = load_digits()

print(digits.data)
print("### digits.data.shape:", digits.data.shape)
print(digits.target)
print("### digits.target.shape:", digits.target.shape)
